about_the_game:
Köln– Koblenz Scenario Pack 01 includes 10 challenging and enjoyable scenarios for the Köln - Koblenz route on Steam, covering passenger operations in this scenic part of the West Rhine.

Take the controls of Sgns Hopper Pack, Rnoos Hopper Pack and Sgns Container Pack to haul passengers and freight on regular train services along the line following real world timetables with real world difficulties from poor weather to red signals.

Note:
To drive all 10 career scenarios in the pack, players will require West Rhine: Köln - Koblenz Route Add-On (available separately) and select scenarios also individually require Train Simulator’s Sgns Hopper Pack, Rnoos Hopper Pack and Sgns Container Pack (each available separately).

Included Scenarios


The Köln - Koblenz Scenario Pack Add-on includes ten operating challenges in career scenario form for the Köln – Koblenz Route (Available Separately):

Requiring Köln - Koblenz:

  • Regional service 10509 Part 1
  • Regional service 10509 Part 2
  • Regional service 10522 Part 1
  • Regional service 10522 Part 2
  • Containers to Andernach
  • Intercity 2313
  • Shunting in Wuerth

Requiring Köln – Koblenz, ÖBB Sgns Hopper Pack, ÖBB Rnoos Wagon Pack and ÖBB Sgns Container Wagon Pack:

  • Intercity 119
  • Freight from Andernach
  • Freight from Bonn to Köln

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows® 7 / 8.1
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:40 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
  • Graphics:Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
